item.title: Setting up (Neo)vim for React development
item.description: Table of Contents Syntax Highlighting Linters and Formatters Autocompletion Commenting Conclusion It’s been 8 months since I have been using (neo)vim as my primary text editor. Initially it was incredibly tough to adopt and use it in work. Well that would be another story to tell. Back then I was working mostly in backend using CoffeeScript (I know ðŸ™ˆ).
